Client.description: Use parent_path with action create and only use client_uid with action update while get is Client and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: type of portal for example Client

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: the path to the parent for example clients

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the client

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the client

fields.name: ClientID
fields.description: The id that uniquely identifies the client

fields.name: BulkDiscount
fields.description: One or zero to indicate if bulk discount applies

fields.name: MemberDiscountApplies
fields.description: One or zero to indicate if member discount applies

fields.name: CCEmails
fields.description: Default Emails to CC all published ARs for this client

fields.name: EmailSubject
fields.description: Items to be included in email subject lines

fields.name: EmailAddress
fields.description: Email address of the company

Project.description: Use the field parent_path with action create and client_uid only with action update while get is Project and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: type of portal for example Project

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: the path to the parent for example clients/client-1

fields.name: StudyType
fields.description: The name of the client

fields.name: title
fields.description: The name of the project

fields.name: description
fields.description: What the project is all about

fields.name: NumParticipants
fields.description: How many will participate in this study

fields.name: AgeLow
fields.description: The youngest allowed age for a participant

fields.name: AgeHigh
fields.description: The oldest allowed age for a participant

fields.name: DateCreated
fields.type: string in date format for example 2017-08-17
fields.description: Email address of the company

fields.name: Service
fields.description: Email address of the company

SampleType.description: Use parent_path with action create and only use sampletype_uid with action update while get is SampleType and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: type of portal for example SampleType

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: the path to the parent for example bika_sampletypes

fields.name: RetentionDays
fields.description: How long a sample of this type can be retained

fields.name: title
fields.description: The name of this sample type

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of this sample type

fields.name: Prefix
fields.description: A short code that will identify this sample type

fields.name: MinimumVolume
fields.description: The absolute minimum amount that can be selected for a sample of this type

fields.name: Hazardous
fields.description: One or zero indicating if this sample is dangerous or not

DiseaseOntology.description: Use parent_path with action create and only use diseaseontology_uid with action update while get is DiseaseOntology and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: type of portal for example DiseaseOntology

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: the path to the parent for example bika_sampletypes

fields.name: Version
fields.description: Version of selected ontology for disease

fields.name: Code
fields.description: Disease code for selected disease ontology

fields.name: FreeText
fields.description: Explanation about disease or symptom in case of unknown disease or insufficient information

Patient.description: Use parent_path with action create and only use diseaseontology_uid with action update while get is DiseaseOntology and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: type of portal for example DiseaseOntology

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: the path to the parent for example bika_sampletypes

fields.name: SelectedProject
fields.description: The uid of the project that this patient will belong to

fields.name: InfoLink
fields.description: The link to information for this patient

fields.name: Sex
fields.description: Male or Female or Unknown or Undifferentiated indicating sex of patient

fields.name: Age
fields.description: The age of the patient

fields.name: AgeUnit
fields.description: Years or Months or Weeks or Days or Hours or Minutes indicating unit which measures age of the patient

Sample.description: Use parent_path with action create and only use sample_uid with action update while get is Sample and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: type of portal for example Sample

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: the path to the parent for example clients/client-1/project-1 where client-1 and project-1 are ids

fields.name: LinkedSample
fields.description: The uid of the parent Sample that this sample belongs to

fields.name: Project
fields.description: The uid of the project that this sample will belong to

fields.name: SampleType
fields.description: The uid or the title of the sample type that this sample will belong to such as  Whole Blood or 4dd3a41560934613924b98dcbb5b7e5f

fields.name: Barcode
fields.description: The barcode that uniquely identifies this sample

fields.name: StoragePosition
fields.description: The uid of the storage position that the sample will be stored in

fields.name: Volume
fields.description: The collected amount of the sample

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: The unit in which volume is measured for example ml

fields.name: APISource
fields.description: Used by some sources to identify themselves for special processing for example Azzizi will specify odk

fields.name: AnatomicalSiteTerm
fields.description: The ICD-O-3 topography code for describing the anatomical source of the sampled material

fields.name: AnatomicalSiteDescription
fields.description: The anatomical position of the body where the solid sample was taken from

StorageUnit.description: Create storage unit(s) for eg. Room, Freezer, Shelf, etc while get is StorageUnit and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: A unique value can be assigned to portal_type and must be 'StorageUnit' .

fields.name: department
fields.description: The department where the storage unit is located

fields.name: temperature
fields.description: The temperature of the storage unit.

fields.name: prefix
fields.description: Prefix of the IDs and Titles of the storage units. This will be appended with leading_zeros

fields.name: leading_zeros
fields.description: leading_zeros are used to construct the ids of the storage units. Eg. 00 for 2 zeros.

fields.name: seq_start
fields.description: Id start number

fields.name: number_items
fields.description: Number of storage units to create.

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: parent folder path. Eg. storage/Room-001

ManagedStorage.description: Create managed storage (Boxes) while get is ManagedStorage and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: A unique value can be assigned to portal_type and must be 'ManagedStorage' .

fields.name: prefix
fields.description: Prefix of the IDs and Titles of the boxes. This will be appended with leading_zeros

fields.name: leading_zeros
fields.description: leading_zeros are used to construct the IDs of the boxes. Eg. 00 for 2 zeros.

fields.name: seq_start
fields.description: Id start number

fields.name: number_items
fields.description: Number of boxes to create.

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: parent folder path. Eg. storage/Room-001

fields.name: number_positions
fields.description: Number of positions in a box.

fields.name: x_axis
fields.description: Number of columns of the box 2D graphic representation.

fields.name: y_axis
fields.description: Number of rows of the box 2D graphic representation.

UnmanagedStorage.description: Create managed storage (Boxes) while get is UnmanagedStorage and uses no fields

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: A unique value can be assigned to portal_type and must be 'UnmanagedStorage' .

fields.name: prefix
fields.description: Prefix of the IDs and Titles of the storage. This will be appended with leading_zeros

fields.name: leading_zeros
fields.description: leading_zeros are used to construct the IDs of the storage. Eg. 00 for 2 zeros.

fields.name: seq_start
fields.description: Id start number

fields.name: number_items
fields.description: Number of storage to create.

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: parent folder path. Eg. storage/Room-001
